name: Fertilizers

pages.text: Fertilizers are used to add nutrients to $(l:food/crops)crops$(). $(thing)$(k:key.use)$() with a fertilizer in your hand on some $(thing)farmland$() or a $(thing)crop$() to add the nutrients. Some particles should appear.
pages.title: Fertilization

pages.text: The composter is an essential tool for making fertilizer. It needs 4 $(2)green$() and 4 $(4)brown$() items to work. To add an item to it, $(thing)$(k:key.use)$().

Green items include $(2)plants$(), $(2)fruits$(), $(2)vegetables$() and $(2)grains$(). Brown items include $(4)humus$(), $(4)paper$(), $(4)dead grass$(), $(4)driftwood$(), and $(4)pinecones$(). When compost is ready, the composter will begin to visually smoke.
Some items will $(c)poison$() your compost. These include $(c)meat$() and $(c)bones$(). Poison compost, when used on a crop, instantly kills it.
Compost is the product of the composter. $(br)$(li)$(b)Nitrogen: 40$()$(li)$(6)Phosphorous: 20$()$(li)$(d)Potassium: 40$()
Bonemeal is made of crushed bones. $(br)$(li)$(6)Phosphorous: 10$()
Saltpeter is made from its ore. $(br)$(li)$(b)Nitrogen: 10$()$(li)$(d)Potassium: 40$()
Guano is found deep underground and on gravelly shores. $(br)$(li)$(b)Nitrogen: 80$()$(li)$(6)Phosphorous: 50$()$(li)$(d)Potassium: 10$()
Wood ash is made from broken firepits. $(br)$(li)$(6)Phosphorous: 10$()$(li)$(d)Potassium: 30$()
Sylvite is made from its ore. $(br)$(li)$(6)Phosphorous: 50$()
